name: ol' reliable top down socks
notes:
adult s (m, l)
finished measurements (unstretched): 7.5 (8, 9)” (stretches comfortably up to about 11 (12, 13)”
circumference). leg and foot lengths vary depending on knitter's preference.

sample shown in tanis fiber arts 8-ply twist in *hummingbird* colourway. 

**why top down socks?**
though i do knit a lot of toe up socks these days (see my trusty toe up socks pattern for the reasons why!) i am still partial to the fit of a top down sock. for me, nothing fits better than a heel gusset and though it is possible to work a gusset toe up, top down, with a heel gusset is my
happy place.
